original_text: So she went down to the threshing floor and did everything her mother-in-law told her to do.
korean_text: 그가 타작 마당으로 내려가서 시어머니의 명령대로 다 하니라

sentences.original_text: So she went down to the threshing floor
her mother-in-law told her to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 시어머니가 그녀에게 하라고 말한 것을
